embed.title: 🤝 Partner Collection: BeHoldak <:BEHOLDAK:1366352884836335616>
embed.description:
The mystical **BeHoldak** tribe has joined the Bandits!
 Among them, 5 lucky members will receive **1 whitelist** 
— [check out the announcement on X](https://x.com/monad_bandit/status/1916794546509201431).

🔗 Don't forget to save your wallet : **`/savewallet <your-address>`**.

> _“Eyes open, treasures near.”_
